title: Ijust read an article about a new OIB park...where is this located? I\'m glad it may open by July 4th. What dos the park have to offer kids age 1 to 11? My 4 grandkids will be excited to find some new things to do while vacationing at the beach.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7067
